hillbillies.model.unit

Class FollowActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • hillbillies.model.unit.Activity
      • hillbillies.model.unit.MoveActivity
        • hillbillies.model.unit.FollowActivity

  • class FollowActivity
extends MoveActivity
    The activity for following another unit.

    • Method Detail

      • advanceTime

        @Model
void advanceTime(double dt)
        Updates the follow activity for the given time step.
        Overrides:
        advanceTime in class MoveActivity
        Parameters:
        dt - The given time step.
        Postconditions:
      • If the other unit exists and the unit is standing in the centre of a cube then if the unit is standing on a position next to the other unit or the other unit is dead, the unit will finish following the other unit.
      • Else if the the unit is not standing on the same cube as the other unit, the unit will update his target to the cube of the other unit.
        • Effect:
        Advances the parent move activity of this follow activity
            super.advanceTime(dt)

      • setOther

        @Model
void setOther(Unit other)
              throws InvalidUnitException,
                     UnreachableTargetException,
                     InvalidPositionException
        Sets the unit to follow and starts the following
        Parameters:
        other - The unit to follow
        Postcondition:
        Sets the other unit.
            new.getOther() == other
        Effect:
        Updates the target to follow.
            this.updateTarget(other.getPosition().toIntVector())
        Throws:
        InvalidUnitException - Throws if the other unit is null or not alive. | other == null || !other.isAlive()
        UnreachableTargetException
        InvalidPositionException

      • canSwitch

        boolean canSwitch()
        The activity is only controllable by default behaviour so the default behaviour can always switch activities.
        Overrides:
        canSwitch in class MoveActivity
        Returns:
        Always returns true
            result == true
